[[1981â82 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1981â82]] |} The [[1980â81 Turkish First Football League|1980â81]] season was the 10th season of [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) [[association football|football]] team in [[Turkish First Football League|First League]], the first level division in [[Turkey]]. They have relegated to second division at the end of the season. It was third time the team relegated. The club signed with coach Ä°smet ArÄ±kan. ArÄ±kan's assistant was conditioner Seyfi Alanya. ==1980â81 league participation== The [[1980â81 Turkish First Football League|1980â81]] season was the 23rd season of [[Turkish First Football League|First League]]. The league was played with 16 teams and last three teams were relegated to [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1981â82 Turkish Second Football League|1981â82]]. [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] finished 15th [[1980â81 Turkish First Football League|First League 1980â81]] season and relegated to second division. Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu has become the only team in the history of [[SÃ¼per Lig|Turkish first level football league]], whose points were deleted. In 1980â81 season the team has drawn away from the field in [[BeÅiktaÅ J.K.|BeÅiktaÅ]] game. For that reason [[Turkey Football Federation|TFF]] decided to award the match to BeÅiktaÅ by 3-0 and delete two extra points of MÄ°Y.See "Ligin rekorlarÄ± ve ilkleri" in Turkish [http://arama.hurriyet.com.tr/arsivnews.aspx?id=12209113 HÃ¼rriyet] MÄ°Y finished season with 21 points at 15th place, 6 points back of 14th team.
